content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You are welcome to explore the variety of EPAM applications and tools that help us deliver, grow, and connect with our teammates. Here is a list of tools we encourage you to explore within the next couple of months and we will gradually transition you to the key reporting.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Global Menu\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://menu.epam.com/app/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Global Menu\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is a quick search of EPAM's internal systems. Global Menu connects all applications in the EPAM ecosystem and helps users find projects, employees, or applications. You do not need to go back and forth between a many different sites or figure out where to find the information you need: Global Menu lets you find what you need in one place in just seconds.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":95130,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/12752a55-f347-433b-b6da-accec401131a/menu.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/12752a55-f347-433b-b6da-accec401131a/menu.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"menu.PNG\",\"name\":\"menu.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"12752a55-f347-433b-b6da-accec401131a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":704,\"height\":577},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You have quick access to the Global Menu from any internal site (e.g. Onboarding Portal), just click the Global Menu button in the top right
